Q8: Increasing the prevalence/priority advertisement which addresses sexual harassment,Stricter regulation of posts/content on social media sites,Please describe any other thoughts you have on ways technology could mitigate sexual harassment:
Q8_6_TEXT: I don't really think social media can strongly fight sexual harassment. Users can block harassers, and the website can suspend reported harassers; but that's about it.
